name: Aztlan
description:
One day, long ago, a ray of light hit a lonely mech, waking him up. He is an upkeeper named Tetl who has been left behind in the move to a new home world. Darkness and guards around the ruins as well as more dangers await on this jorney. 

In this game you will guide Tetl on his way to Aztlan. ¨

This game was made as part of an education at The Game Assembly (TGA). It was meant to be a mobile game but since not everyone an Android device Aztlan is released for WebGL.
